author: milos88
content:
not sure if this is the best place to ask this, but:
1. what is the max size of a contact in bytes?
2. was it always that size or did it change over time and are there plans to change it in the future?
3. will it change after Verkle? (my understanding is that it will be stored differently at that point)

author: _shemnon
content:
1. 24*1024, so 24576.  Init code can be twice that, so 49152 or 48k
2. The contract limit was added in Suprious Dragon, in 2016.  Init code limit since Shanghai, in 2023.  There are no in-flight plans to change, but that doesn't mean it will never change.
3. If it changes post-verkle is more likely than pre-verkle.
